letters.description: Evaluate the client's energetic state through observation, intuition, and energy testing to identify imbalances and blockages.
Explore the emotional, mental, and spiritual factors contributing to the energy imbalances and connect them to the client's life experiences.
Apply specific energy healing techniques (e.g., Reiki, chakra balancing, sound healing) to clear blockages, release stagnant energy, and restore energetic harmony.
Facilitate the integration of new energetic patterns and empower the client with tools and practices to maintain balance and enhance their well-being long-term.
